comment: I took Dr. Tolbert for Thermo 1 (MET 3401). It's a very hard subject and Tolbert will make you work for your grade. The only grade that counts is the final but you NEED to do homework to understand the material. Luckily, he will not take off many points for wrong answers, as long as you can show you understand the material and how to problem solve.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Hilarious

comment: First few weeks had to draw things entirely by hand and was quite challenging but Prof was very lenient and understanding. relatively laidback and easy class. I came into the class knowing solidworks but he taught it very well explaining the different functions and ways to create parts. gives tons of relatively easy quizzes so dont skip
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT
